text: Amiopsis is an extinct genus of prehistoric bony fish belonging to the family Amiidae. The type species is Amiopsis prisca. == List of species == * †Amiopsis damoni * †Amiopsis dolloi * †Amiopsis lepidota * †Amiopsis prisca (type) * †Amiopsis woodwardi == Synonymy == * Megalurus * Synergus * Urocles == Related pages == * Sinamia * List of prehistoric bony fish genera == References == *The Paleobiology Database Amiopsis entry *MartÍn-Abad, Hugo; Poyato-Ariza, Francisco JosÉ (2017-11-07). "A new genus and species for the amiiform fishes previously assigned to Amiopsis from the Early Cretaceous of Las Hoyas, Cuenca, Spain". Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society. Category:Extinct fish Category:Jurassic
title: Amiopsis
